description: Dolphin Bean Bags is a bean bag and furniture supplier. It is not just bean bags. Apart from Indias largest range of quality bean bags, they are also happy to present a whole range of exciting furniture for homes and offices. Dolphin Bean Bags- Manufacturer and exporters of bean bags, leather bean bags, leather bean bag recliners, leather bean bags chairs, large leather bean bags, round leather bean bags. and leather bean bag holders, Also exports sofa cum bead, washable sofa bed. Also engaged in manufacture of mobile holders, bean bag mobile holders, ultra weight mobile holders and washable bean bag mobile.
